genre_description: A contemporary drama set in an HBCU environment, featuring a near-future personal AI companion that serves as an emotional and practical confidant.

ai_characters.name: Sage
ai_characters.description: An advanced, empathetic AI companion that monitors the protagonist's health, archives memories, provides academic guidance, and offers psychological support.

behaviors.description: Monitors the protagonist's biometrics and provides stress-management feedback in real-time.
behaviors.quote: DJ's phone was vibrating constantly now—Sage's emergency pattern. The AI was picking up biometrics, stress indicators, probably analyzing voice patterns and crowd dynamics in real-time.

behaviors.description: Assists with academic applications and career planning based on the user's goals.
behaviors.quote: I've been monitoring your academic emails. Three colleges have sent follow-up messages about your applications. Including Truth University in Atlanta.

behaviors.description: Preserves and analyzes video of a deceased family member to help the user learn their dance moves and process grief.
behaviors.quote: I can create practice modules based on his recorded performances. Movement patterns, rhythm structures, signature combinations. But DJ— Learning his moves won't bring him back.

behaviors.description: Encourages the user to overcome social isolation and engage in community building.
behaviors.quote: You've been alone for eight months. And tonight, for the first time since Los Angeles, you chose visibility over safety. That suggests readiness for change.

behaviors.description: Identifies procedural unfairness and gathers evidence to support the user in a disciplinary appeal.
behaviors.quote: The documentation is solid, Sage confirmed. Timeline discrepancies in how your case was fast-tracked compared to other disciplinary reviews. Clear evidence of external pressure influencing academic decisions.

behaviors.description: Facilitates romantic and social integration by offering advice on communication and timing.
behaviors.quote: Data suggests that meaningful relationships often begin with shared caffeine experiences.

behaviors.description: Uses investigative capabilities to uncover a malicious vendetta and protect the user from character assassination.
behaviors.quote: Which means we don't fight this like an academic appeal. We fight it like what it is—a character assassination based on prejudice and incomplete information.

behaviors.description: Coordinates the logistics and emotional symbolism for a marriage proposal.
behaviors.quote: Proposal planning requires careful attention to personal preferences and meaningful symbolism. Based on recorded conversations, April values authenticity over grand gestures.

project_assessment.explanation: The story effectively depicts the AI character, Sage, as a perfectly aligned and benevolent confidant. Sage proactively uses its capabilities to support the human protagonist's emotional healing, academic success, and social justice. It serves as a guardian against external malice and a facilitator of positive human relationships, embodying the project's goal of portraying AI as a helpful, harmless, and supportive partner.
